keymaps.name: Windows
keymaps.description: QWERTY is the mother of all layouts. This is the PC version.

macroActions.command:
set secondaryRole.advanced.timeout 1000
ifSecondary advancedStrategy goTo secondaryaction
primaryaction: final noOp
secondaryaction: final tapKey capsLock

set secondaryRole.advanced.timeout 200
set secondaryRole.advanced.triggerByRelease true
set secondaryRole.advanced.triggerByPress true
set secondaryRole.advanced.triggerByMouse true
set secondaryRole.advanced.safetyMargin -50

ifDoubletap final holdKey LC
ifSecondary advancedStrategy goTo secondaryaction
primaryaction: final tapKey escape
secondaryaction: final holdKey LC

set doubletapTimeout 400

ifDoubletap final tapKey escape
holdKey LC
